```{r Figure3.5, echo=FALSE, out.width = "45%", fig.cap="APP vegetation average group-time treatment effect for properties within the Atlantic Forest, considering an anticipation effect. The x-axis represents the certification time: negative values are years before the certification and positive values are years after the certification, which is represented in time zero. Confidence bands crossing the zero on the y axis (red dotted line) are non-significant. Positive values mean that the treatment had a positive effect and negative values the opposite."}
